description: This React component handles the OAuth callback flow for Jira integration, managing authorization status, displaying feedback messages, and redirecting users accordingly.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component that wraps the OAuth callback handling inside a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component that processes search parameters, manages authorization status, displays feedback, and handles redirection.
